about_the_game:
Dive deeper into the world of Tunnel Escape and become an essential part of our creative journey! By grabbing this exclusive pack, you’re not just supporting future content; you’re unlocking a treasure trove of delights:

  • Artbook: Check how the amazing art and animations of this game were made without any censorship!
  • 2 Smoking Hot (+18) 4k Wallpapers: Elevate your screen with two jaw-dropping, ultra-HD wallpapers.



Show your love for our game and get these sizzling rewards in return! Your support means the world to us, and with your help, we can continue to deliver thrilling new content. Don’t miss out on these exclusive goodies!

Note: After purchasing this DLC go to your Steam game folder (usually located in C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Tunnel Escape) and open the folder "Guide and Wallpapers DLC".

content_descriptors.notes:
This DLC may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: 

Violence, drugs, non-consensual sex, self-harm, and General Mature Content.
